meanings.definition: A type of sausage made from various meats.
meanings.sent1: I bought some polony from the store to make sandwiches.
meanings.sent2: The polony at the deli looked delicious and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The polony in my sandwich tried to escape, but I caught it!
meanings.sent4: The polony was a colorful mix of meats, like a tasty rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the polony cooking filled the kitchen with a savory smell.

meanings.sent1: The polony in the fridge was perfect for a quick snack.
meanings.sent2: I wondered how they made the polony taste so good.
meanings.sent3: The polony package had a funny picture of a dancing pig.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as fake as a slice of polony.
meanings.sent5: The polony had a smooth texture that melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A type of food often used in sandwiches.
meanings.sent1: I added some polony to my sandwich for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The polony and cheese combination was a classic favorite.
meanings.sent3: The polony in my lunchbox whispered, 'Eat me first!'
meanings.sent4: The polony was the star of the sandwich, stealing the show.
meanings.sent5: The polony slices were neatly stacked between the bread, ready to be enjoyed.
